data.Biography: He was married to a daughter of Nabû-ahhē-iddin of the Egibi family.

data.Name: Kalbāya
data.ind.Name: Kalbāya
data.Biography: He was the son of Šumu-ukīn and of the sister of Nabû-ahhē-iddin. Nabû-ahhē-iddin from the Egibi family adopted him, cf. CTMMA 3, no. 53.

data.Name: Marduk-šumu-ibni
data.ind.Name: Marduk-šumu-ibni
data.Biography: Protagonist of the Ilia A+B archive. Younger brother of Nabû-bēlšunu and older brother of Nabû-ēṭer-napšāti and Nergal-iddin. Husband of {{f}}Inṣabtu/Marduk-šumu-iddin//Ša-nāšišu. Father of Nabû-balassu-iqbi (Nabû-bullissu), {{f}}Amat-Nanāya, {{f}}Amat-Ninlil and {{f}}Binunu. Grandfather of Libluṭ/Nabû-balāssu-iqbi.

data.Name: Puršû
data.ind.Name: Nergal-ušēzib
data.Biography: Note that in BM 32205+ his name is consistently spelled Nergal-ušallim(GI), but the family relationships in this document demonstrate it has to be Nergal-ušēzib.
